1312040.name: Hide Or Die - Golden Boy Supporter Pack
1312040.description:
Help Support Hide or Die!

The Golden Boy Supporter Pack is an awesome way to both help us continue to update and develop the game, while also helping make your Survivor look extremely fashionable. The pack contains the following items:

Includes:

  • Stitches Skin: Golden Boy
  • Golden Boy Survivor Jacket
  • Golden Boy Survivor Jeans
  • Golden Boy Survivor Shoes
  • Golden Boy Nametag

NOTE: Skins will be unlocked and available to be equipped when the associated character is unlocked in game. Purchasing this bundle will NOT unlock your character in advance. You will still need to progress in the game to unlock the character and associated skins.
1312040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语, 繁体中文, 韩语, 简体中文, 泰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
